text: Sort the five towns according to the number of overnight visitors in 2018, from most visited to least visited!
Sort these buildings according to their height, from the highest to the lowest!
Sort these CSS selectors according to their specificity, from most specific to least specific!
Sort these inventions in chronological order (from the oldest to the youngest)!
Sort these countries according to the average height of their citizens, from the tallest to the shortest (by year of birth 1994)!
Sort these towns according to the number of bridges they have, from most to least!
Sort these languages according to their speakers worldwide, from most spoken to least spoken!
Sort these countries according to the price of one Big Mac, from the most expensive to the cheapest (in US-Dollar)!
Sort these programming languages according to the year of their invention, from the oldest to the youngest!
Sort these countries according to the year when their first IKEA store opened, from the oldest to the youngest!
Sort these countries according to the height of their highest mountain, from the hightest to the lowest!
Sort these car brands according to the number of worldwide produced cars in 2012, from the highest to the lowest!
Sort these countries according to the speed limit on highways for automobiles (without trailer), from highest to lowest!
Sort these countries according to the number of millionares that live there, from the most to the least!
Sort these airports according to the number of passengers in 2019, from the highest to the lowest!
Sort these famous brands/companies according to the year of their foundation, from the oldest to the youngest!
Sort these fruits and vegetables according to their amount of vitamin C, from the highest to the lowest!
Sort these planets according to their maximum distance to the earth, from the nearest to the farthest!
Sort these animals according to their average life expectancy, from the highest to the lowest!
Sort these films according to their year of production, from the oldest to the youngest!
